Reviews.Title: Bypass Immobilizer
Reviews.Author: JK
Reviews.Content: If you want remote start in a car with immobilizer you need to buy this simple device, works OK with the viper 5901 alarm and my Fiat Punto GT..

Reviews.Title: Works for compatible DEI manufactured Remote Start systems
Reviews.Author: Renny Yu
Reviews.Content: This item is compatible with the Python 872 & is most likely compatible with almost all DEI manufactured remote start & security/remote start systems. You have to give up a Valet Key or have another key made with the chip built in.

Reviews.Title: Worked like a charm.
Reviews.Author: Chris L. McIntyre
Reviews.Content: Got this product for a remote start system to bypass the factory immobilizer.  Worked like a charm.

Reviews.Title: GOOD UNIT FOR THE $$$$
Reviews.Author: bigflippa_ny
Reviews.Content: The unit works great, can't beat the price.  Only thing is that you will need an extra key in the device.

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Wickedspawn24
Reviews.Content: A must have for my truck to work with my alarm and this was the best price around for the item

Reviews.Title: Not strong enough
Reviews.Author: mcodavona
Reviews.Content: Yes it immobilized the chip in the key but not enough amps to work with the remote starter, had to order another one from another vendor, I will be returning this one for a refund.

Reviews.Title: did not install.
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Never got a chance to install it with the remote starter unit that I got. PLUS I think I sent it to the wrong place for credit so I never got a confirm notice that it got back the right place,

Reviews.Title: Takes a key
Reviews.Author: John R Bivens
Reviews.Content: There are bypasses that don't require you to give up a key.  I recommend one of them over this one.

Reviews.Title: Universal bypass not so universal
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: This "Universal" bypass was not universal enough to work on my 2004 Truck. Thankfully the company that installed my remote start took it in on trade.

Reviews.Title: bypass
Reviews.Author: Richard Anthony Betourne
Reviews.Content: Per every car installer this product is way out of date and will not adapt to the car I have.  Not sure if they are just saying that because they want me to buy their product.

Reviews.Title: no good old model
Reviews.Author: Her$H
Reviews.Content: i had tobuy one from the audio installer because this old model would require me to physically leave on key inside the box, so that was no good for me!!! I wanted to use this for a prestige remote/alarm

Reviews.Title: Exactly what i needed
Reviews.Author: xhacks
Reviews.Content: worked perfectly and was easy to installonly con is that i had to take the transponder out of key as the honda key did not fit in the case

Reviews.Title: check fit before buying, it did not work on mine.. I called before I purchased and they said it would work.. it did not work!!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: The fit was identified prior to purchasing and when received it did not work, the installer verified the fit and it is supposed to fit my application.

Reviews.Title: I NEED HELP!!!!
Reviews.Author: FlyGuyCed
Reviews.Content: I just bought this item last wednesday and just received it today in the mail. I have a 2005 Chevy Impala with no chip in the key can Someone tell me if I will need a extra key to go inside of this module or not. So if I do need it I can heve it when I go to get it installed... Please and Thank You

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Cory
Reviews.Content: Product works as advertised. This works if you have an extra key that can be placed inside the unit. Next time, I will probably purchase a programmable Immobilizer Bypass system so that I can still have a spare key. Still works though and on a budget, would consider getting another for the next install.

Reviews.Title: Scam Artist
Reviews.Author: NK 1077
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 of these 556 u units from this scam artist becuase i do remote starts as a side job, well i bought them in december 2011 , went to install my first remote start of the year 2012 September 29th 2012 and all of them are missing the sensor rings to go around the key cylinder.... I got ripped off and beat on money but just for warning future buyers steer clear of this seller , there thieves and I will do all in my power to make sure they cant sell on this website, on to step 2 contacting better business bureau, then Amazon.com directly. This seller should be ashamed of themselves

Reviews.Title: make one for 1.99 $
Reviews.Author: John P
Reviews.Content: I bought few of them, but now I just make them: Hide a key from Walgreens, wrap two wires around the key, close the box...done. Check the diagram to see what it is for real, then...you will agree with me. Have fun !!

Reviews.Title: did not need it after all
Reviews.Author: Brooks A. Wertz
Reviews.Content: Ordered because everything said I would need it for an 07 entourage... but I didn't so it works well as a paper weight but for what it is worth.. I think the product will work great if I ever need it

ProductInfo.Features:
Bypasses immobilizer during remote start only
Simple two-wire connection for easy installation
Bypadd Module
Dei Bypass Module
Module Car Alarm
ProductInfo.Name: Universal Immobilizer Bypass for Remote Start
